messages.message: Hey team! I made a *quick video about an Instabase vulnerability (https://www.loom.com/share/1aa261da0f344a549318abbeb591a9df)* that got patched last week (unrelated to log4j). I’ll throw the associated PR in the thread as well (but if you want to try to puzzle-solve, try watching beginning of the video first for the prompt!)
The PR also has a little writeup of the vulnerability if you’re more of a reader instead of a video-watcher :slightly_smiling_face:
Cool demo! How did you found this security bug in the first place?
Haha I was looking at security from a SaaS perspective and was poking around in account service
